verses.verse: And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

<S%H6680>Command<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, that they put <S%H7971>out<s%> of the <S%H4264>camp<s%> every <S%H6879>leper<s%>, and every one that has an <S%H2100>issue<s%>, and whoever is <S%H2931>defiled<s%> by the <S%H5315>dead<s%>:

Both <S%H2145>male<s%> and <S%H5347>female<s%> shall you put <S%H7971>out<s%>, <S%H2351>outside<s%> the <S%H4264>camp<s%> shall you <S%H7971>put<s%> <S%H2930>them<s%>; that they defile not their <S%H4264>camps<s%>, in the <S%H8432>middle<s%> <S%H834>whereof<s%> I <S%H7931>live<s%>.

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> did <S%H6213>so<s%>, and put them <S%H7971>out<s%> <S%H2351>outside<s%> the <S%H4264>camp<s%>: as the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, so <S%H6213>did<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.
And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

<S%H1696>Speak<s%> unto the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, When a <S%H376>man<s%> or <S%H802>woman<s%> shall <S%H6213>commit<s%> any <S%H2403>sin<s%> that <S%H120>men<s%> <S%H4603>commit<s%>, to do a <S%H4604>trespass<s%> against the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, and that <S%H5315>person<s%> be <S%H816>guilty<s%>;

Then they shall <S%H3034>confess<s%> their <S%H2403>sin<s%> which they have <S%H6213>done<s%>: and he shall <S%H7725>recompense<s%> his <S%H817>trespass<s%> with the <S%H7218>principal<s%> <S%H3254>there<s%>, and add unto it the <S%H2549>fifth<s%> part <S%H5414>there<s%>, and give it unto him against whom he has <S%H816>trespassed<s%>.

But if the <S%H376>man<s%> have no <S%H1350>kinsman<s%> to <S%H7725>recompense<s%> the <S%H817>trespass<s%> <S%H817>unto<s%>, let the trespass be <S%H7725>recompensed<s%> unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, even to the <S%H3548>priest<s%>; beside the <S%H352>ram<s%> of the <S%H3725>atonement<s%>, by which an atonement shall be made for <S%H3722>him<s%>.
And every <S%H8641>offering<s%> of all the holy <S%H6944>things<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, which they <S%H7126>bring<s%> unto the <S%H3548>priest<s%>, shall be his.
And every <S%H376>man<s%>'s hallowed <S%H6944>things<s%> shall be <S%H376>his<s%>: whatever any man <S%H5414>gives<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%>, it shall be his.
And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

<S%H1696>Speak<s%> unto the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and <S%H559>say<s%> unto <S%H376>them<s%>, If any <S%H376>man<s%>'s <S%H802>wife<s%> go <S%H7847>aside<s%>, and <S%H4603>commit<s%> a trespass against <S%H4604>him<s%>,

And a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H7901>lie<s%> with her <S%H7902>carnally<s%>, and it be <S%H5956>hid<s%> from the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of her <S%H376>husband<s%>, and be kept <S%H5641>close<s%>, and she be <S%H2930>defiled<s%>, and there be no <S%H5707>witness<s%> against <S%H8610>her<s%>, neither she be taken with the manner;

And the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of <S%H7068>jealousy<s%> <S%H5674>come<s%> upon <S%H7065>him<s%>, and he be jealous of his <S%H802>wife<s%>, and she be <S%H2930>defiled<s%>: or if the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of <S%H7068>jealousy<s%> <S%H5674>come<s%> upon <S%H7065>him<s%>, and he be jealous of his <S%H802>wife<s%>, and she be not <S%H2930>defiled<s%>:

Then shall the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H935>bring<s%> his <S%H802>wife<s%> unto the <S%H3548>priest<s%>, and he shall <S%H935>bring<s%> her <S%H7133>offering<s%> for <S%H6224>her<s%>, the tenth part of an <S%H374>ephah<s%> of <S%H8184>barley<s%> <S%H7058>meal<s%>; he shall <S%H3332>pour<s%> no <S%H8081>oil<s%> upon <S%H5414>it<s%>, nor put <S%H3828>frankincense<s%> on <S%H4503>it<s%>; for it is an offering of <S%H7068>jealousy<s%>, an <S%H4503>offering<s%> of <S%H2146>memorial<s%>, <S%H2142>bringing<s%> <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> to <S%H2142>memory<s%>.
And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall bring her <S%H7126>near<s%>, and <S%H5975>set<s%> her <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>:

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H6918>holy<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> in an <S%H2789>earthen<s%> <S%H3627>vessel<s%>; and of the <S%H6083>dust<s%> that is in the <S%H7172>floor<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H3947>take<s%>, and <S%H5414>put<s%> it into the <S%H4325>water<s%>:

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H5975>set<s%> the <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, and <S%H6544>uncover<s%> the <S%H802>woman<s%>'s <S%H7218>head<s%>, and <S%H5414>put<s%> the <S%H4503>offering<s%> of <S%H2146>memorial<s%> in her <S%H3709>hands<s%>, which is the <S%H7068>jealousy<s%> <S%H4503>offering<s%>: and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall have in his <S%H3027>hand<s%> the <S%H4751>bitter<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> that causes the <S%H779>curse<s%>:

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall charge her by an <S%H7650>oath<s%>, and <S%H559>say<s%> unto the <S%H802>woman<s%>, If no <S%H376>man<s%> have <S%H7901>lain<s%> with <S%H7847>you<s%>, and if you have not gone aside to <S%H2932>uncleanness<s%> with another instead of your <S%H376>husband<s%>, be you <S%H5352>free<s%> from this <S%H4751>bitter<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> that causes the <S%H779>curse<s%>:

But if you have gone <S%H7847>aside<s%> to another instead of your <S%H376>husband<s%>, and if you be <S%H2930>defiled<s%>, and some <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H5414>have<s%> <S%H7903>lain<s%> with you <S%H1107>beside<s%> your <S%H376>husband<s%>:

Then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H7650>charge<s%> the <S%H802>woman<s%> with an <S%H7621>oath<s%> of <S%H423>cursing<s%>, and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H559>say<s%> unto the <S%H802>woman<s%>, The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5414>make<s%> you a <S%H423>curse<s%> and an <S%H7621>oath<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> your <S%H5971>people<s%>, when the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> does <S%H5414>make<s%> your <S%H3409>thigh<s%> to <S%H5307>rot<s%>, and your <S%H990>belly<s%> to <S%H6639>swell<s%>;

And this <S%H4325>water<s%> that causes the <S%H779>curse<s%> shall <S%H935>go<s%> into your <S%H4578>bowels<s%>, to make your <S%H990>belly<s%> to <S%H6638>swell<s%>, and your <S%H3409>thigh<s%> to <S%H5307>rot<s%>: And the <S%H802>woman<s%> shall <S%H559>say<s%>, <S%H543>Amen<s%>, <S%H543>amen<s%>.
And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H3789>write<s%> these <S%H423>curses<s%> in a <S%H5612>book<s%>, and he shall <S%H4229>blot<s%> them out with the <S%H4751>bitter<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%>:

And he shall cause the <S%H802>woman<s%> to <S%H8248>drink<s%> the <S%H4751>bitter<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> that causes the <S%H779>curse<s%>: and the <S%H4325>water<s%> that causes the <S%H779>curse<s%> shall <S%H935>enter<s%> into <S%H4751>her<s%>, and become bitter.

Then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H3947>take<s%> the <S%H7068>jealousy<s%> <S%H4503>offering<s%> out of the <S%H802>woman<s%>'s <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and shall <S%H5130>wave<s%> the <S%H4503>offering<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, and <S%H7126>offer<s%> it upon the <S%H4196>altar<s%>:

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall take an <S%H7061>handful<s%> of the <S%H4503>offering<s%>, even the <S%H234>memorial<s%> <S%H6999>there<s%>, and burn it upon the <S%H4196>altar<s%>, and <S%H310>afterward<s%> shall cause the <S%H802>woman<s%> to <S%H8248>drink<s%> the <S%H4325>water<s%>.

And when he has made her to <S%H8248>drink<s%> the <S%H4325>water<s%>, then it shall come to <S%H2930>pass<s%>, that, if she be defiled, and have <S%H4603>done<s%> <S%H4604>trespass<s%> against her <S%H376>husband<s%>, that the <S%H4325>water<s%> that causes the <S%H779>curse<s%> shall <S%H935>enter<s%> into <S%H4751>her<s%>, and become bitter, and her <S%H990>belly<s%> shall <S%H6638>swell<s%>, and her <S%H3409>thigh<s%> shall <S%H5307>rot<s%>: and the <S%H802>woman<s%> shall be a <S%H423>curse<s%> <S%H7130>among<s%> her <S%H5971>people<s%>.
And if the <S%H802>woman<s%> be not <S%H2930>defiled<s%>, but be <S%H2889>clean<s%>; then she shall be <S%H5352>free<s%>, and shall <S%H2232>conceive<s%> <S%H2233>seed<s%>.
This is the <S%H8451>law<s%> of <S%H7068>jealousy<s%>, when a <S%H802>wife<s%> goes <S%H7847>aside<s%> to another instead of her <S%H376>husband<s%>, and is <S%H2930>defiled<s%>;

Or when the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of <S%H7068>jealousy<s%> <S%H5674>comes<s%> upon <S%H376>him<s%>, and he be <S%H7065>jealous<s%> over his <S%H802>wife<s%>, and shall <S%H5975>set<s%> the <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H6213>execute<s%> upon her all this <S%H8451>law<s%>.
Then shall the <S%H376>man<s%> be <S%H5352>guiltless<s%> from <S%H5771>iniquity<s%>, and <S%H1931>this<s%> <S%H802>woman<s%> shall <S%H5375>carry<s%> her <S%H5771>iniquity<s%>.
